tutorialPages.messageText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "3064611A4A940D28FB694EAC66ECDC5D", "Mayors can use empty plots to build new node services. To start a new construction, select the plot to view what types of Service Buildings can be constructed in that location.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "2AA146CF48DF724E2777D3BFF80848A0", "Before committing to a project, Mayors are able to review a building\'s services, construction costs, maintnence fees, and other important information. The Node needs enough required resources before construction can begin.")
NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "610681224B4DF56A677EF48F8CCAE3AC", "Once construction has begun, citizens of the node will help by donating required materials.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "FB4A26A043D3486C3E3BA68F1BA0B1DA", "If not enough materials are donated in time, the construction will fail. Make sure to consider citizen\'s goals before starting a building project!")
